Netional Highwayg Authority of India considers Information Communication Technology (ICT) an important enabler for time & cost bound implementation of its projects and efficient accomplishment of the other business activities. In this regard, severel ICT solutions for on line and real time data transfer had been developed in the NHAI, some of which are: Corporate mailing solution for all type of data transfer: Specialised epplications which are accessed through authorized user ID &nd passwords. Applications Used for Computerised Project Information System Project management of on-going works; (CPIS) Road Information System (RIS) Operation maintenance of compieted stretches.
